CLR $t1 is
ADD $t1, $zero, $zero
0000 0000 0000 0000 0110 0000 0000 0001
ALUI--ZERO--ZERO--T1-----7'b0----ADD---
00000000000000000110000000000001 = 0x00006001

XORI $t0, $zero, 0b1
0011 1000 0000 1010 0000 0000 0000 0001
XORI--ZERO--T0----0b1------------------
00111000000010100000000000000001 = 0x380A0001

BNE $t0, $t0, error (error at +3 instr, so +2)
1100 1001 0100 1010 0000 0000 0000 0010
BNE---T0----T0----0x2------------------
11001001010010100000000000000010 = 0xC94A0002

BGT $zero, $t0, error is
BLT $t0, $zero, error (error at +2 instr, so +1)
1101 0000 0000 1010 0000 0000 0000 0001
BLT---ZERO--T0----0x1-------------
11010000000010100000000000000001 = 0xD00A0001

BGE $t0, $zero, next is
BLE $zero, $t0, next (next at +2 instr, so +1)
11011001010000000000000000000001
BLE---T0----ZERO--0x1-------------
11011001010000000000000000000001 = 0xD9400001

ADDI $t1, $zero, 0xf
0000 1000 0000 1100 0000 0000 0000 1111
ADDI--ZERO--T1----0xf------------------
00001000000011000000000000001111 = 0x080C000F

SSL $t0, $t0, $t0
0000 0001 0100 1010 0101 0000 0000 1001
ALUI--T0----T0----T0-----7'b0----SSL---
00000001010010100101000000001001 = 0x014A5009

SUR $t0, $t0, $t0
0000 0001 0100 1010 0101 0000 0000 1010
ALUI--T0----T0----T0-----7'b0----SUR---
00000001010010100101000000001010 = 0x014A500A

EQ $t0, $zero, $t0
0000 0000 0000 1010 0101 0000 0001 0000
ALUI--ZERO--T0----T0-----7'b0----EQ----
00000000000010100101000000010000 = 0x000A5010

NEQ $t0, $zero, $t0
0000 0000 0000 1010 0101 0000 0001 0001
ALUI--ZERO--T0----T0-----7'b0----NEQ---
00000000000010100101000000010001 = 0x000A5011

OR $t0, $zero, $t0
0000 0000 0000 1010 0101 0000 0000 0110
ALUI--ZERO--T0----T0-----7'b0----OR----
00000000000010100101000000000110 = 0x000A5006

XOR $t0, $t0, $t0
0000 0001 0100 1010 0101 0000 0000 0111
ALUI--T0----T0----T0-----7'b0----XOR---
00000001010010100101000000000111 = 0x014A5007

AND $t0, $t0, $t0
0000 0001 0100 1010 0101 0000 0000 0101
ALUI--T0----T0----T0-----7'b0----AND---
00000001010010100101000000000101 = 0x014A5005

NOT $t0, $t0
0000 0001 0100 0000 0101 0000 0000 0100
ALUI--T0----ZERO--T0-----7'b0----NOT---
00000001010000000101000000000100 = 0x01405004

ADDI $t1, $t1, 1
0000 1001 1000 1100 0000 0000 0000 0001
ADDI--T1----T1----1--------------------
00001001100011000000000000000001 = 0x098C0001
